lines.text: Mike, a computer could bring some order to this place, into your life...
I can't think of a better reason for not having one.
Eve, meet Nitro Starr. Living proof that man hasn't been out of the trees too long.
The only thing Barrington liked more than talking was listening to himself.
Nitro Starr - 250 pounds of blod clot and scar tissue. He had a 72 inch chest and an IQ to match.
